00038 class Dataspace;
00039 
00069 class L4_EXPORT Rm :
00070   public L4::Kobject_t<Rm, L4::Kobject, L4Re::Protocol::Rm>
00071 {
00072   L4_KOBJECT(Rm)
00073 
00074 public:
00076   enum Detach_result
00077   {
00078     Detached_ds  = 0,      
00079     Kept_ds      = 1,      
00080     Split_ds     = 2,      
00081     Detach_result_mask = 3,
00082 
00083     Detach_again = 4,      
00084   };
00085 
00087   enum Region_flags
00088   {
00089     Read_only          = 0x01, 
00090 
00091     Detach_free        = 0x02,
00092     Pager              = 0x04, 
00093     Reserved           = 0x08, 
00094 
00095     Region_flags       = 0x0f, 
00096   };
00097 
00099   enum Attach_flags
00100   {
00101     Search_addr        = 0x20, 
00102     In_area            = 0x40, 
00103     Eager_map          = 0x80, 
00104 
00105     Attach_flags       = 0xf0, 
00106   };
00107 
00109   enum Detach_flags
00110   {
00120     Detach_exact   = 1,
00130     Detach_overlap = 2,
00131   };
00132 
00133 
00134   template< typename T >
00135   class Auto_region
00136   {
00137   private:
00138     T _addr;
00139     mutable L4::Cap<Rm> _rm;
00140 
00141   public:
00142     Auto_region() throw()
00143     : _addr(0), _rm(L4::Cap<Rm>::Invalid) {}
00144 
00145     explicit Auto_region(T addr) throw()
00146     : _addr(addr), _rm(L4::Cap<Rm>::Invalid) {}
00147 
00148     Auto_region(T addr, L4::Cap<Rm> const &rm) throw()
00149     : _addr(addr), _rm(rm) {}
00150 
00151     Auto_region(Auto_region const &o) throw() : _addr(o.get()), _rm(o._rm)
00152     { o.release(); }
00153 
00154     Auto_region &operator = (Auto_region const &o) throw()
00155     {
00156       if (&o != this)
00157         {
00158     if (_rm.is_valid())
00159       _rm->detach(l4_addr_t(_addr), 0);
00160     _rm = o._rm;
00161     _addr = o.release();
00162         }
00163       return *this;
00164     }
00165 
00166     ~Auto_region() throw()
00167     {
00168       if (_rm.is_valid())
00169   _rm->detach(l4_addr_t(_addr), 0);
00170     }
00171 
00172     T get() const throw() { return _addr; }
00173     T release() const throw() { _rm = L4::Cap<Rm>::Invalid; return _addr; }
00174     void reset(T addr, L4::Cap<Rm> const &rm) throw()
00175     {
00176       if (_rm.is_valid())
00177   _rm->detach(l4_addr_t(_addr), 0);
00178 
00179       _rm = rm;
00180       _addr = addr;
00181     }
00182 
00184     T operator * () const throw() { return _addr; }
00185 
00187     T operator -> () const throw() { return _addr; }
00188 
00189   };
00190 
00213   long reserve_area(l4_addr_t *start, unsigned long size,
00214                     unsigned flags = 0,
00215                     unsigned char align = L4_PAGESHIFT) const throw();
00216 
00231   template< typename T >
00232   long reserve_area(T **start, unsigned long size,
00233                     unsigned flags = 0,
00234                     unsigned char align = L4_PAGESHIFT) const throw()
00235   { return reserve_area((l4_addr_t*)start, size, flags, align); }
00236 
00249   long free_area(l4_addr_t addr) const throw();
00250 
00282   long attach(l4_addr_t *start, unsigned long size, unsigned long flags,
00283               L4::Cap<Dataspace> mem, l4_addr_t offs = 0,
00284               unsigned char align = L4_PAGESHIFT) const throw();
00285 
00291   template< typename T >
00292   long attach(T **start, unsigned long size, unsigned long flags,
00293               L4::Cap<Dataspace> mem, l4_addr_t offs = 0,
00294               unsigned char align = L4_PAGESHIFT) const throw()
00295   {
00296     union X { l4_addr_t a; T* t; };
00297     X *x = reinterpret_cast<X*>(start);
00298     return attach(&x->a, size, flags, mem, offs, align);
00299   }
00300 
00301   template< typename T >
00302   long attach(Auto_region<T> *start, unsigned long size, unsigned long flags,
00303               L4::Cap<Dataspace> mem, l4_addr_t offs = 0,
00304               unsigned char align = L4_PAGESHIFT) const throw()
00305   {
00306     l4_addr_t addr = (l4_addr_t)start->get();
00307 
00308     long res = attach(&addr, size, flags, mem, offs, align);
00309     if (res < 0)
00310       return res;
00311 
00312     start->reset((T)addr, L4::Cap<Rm>(cap()));
00313     return res;
00314   }
00315 
00332   int detach(l4_addr_t addr, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00333              L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task = This_task) const throw();
00334 
00351   int detach(void *addr, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00352              L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task = This_task) const throw();
00353 
00372   int detach(l4_addr_t start, unsigned long size, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00373              L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task) const throw();
00374 
00416   int find(l4_addr_t *addr, unsigned long *size, l4_addr_t *offset,
00417            unsigned *flags, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *m) throw();
00418 
00419   struct Region
00420   {
00421     l4_addr_t start;
00422     l4_addr_t end;
00423     l4_addr_t offset;
00424     L4::Cap<Dataspace> ds;
00425   };
00426 
00427   struct Area
00428   {
00429     l4_addr_t start;
00430     l4_addr_t end;
00431   };
00432 
00433   int get_regions(l4_addr_t start, Region **regions) throw();
00434   int get_areas(l4_addr_t start, Area **areas) throw();
00435 
00436 private:
00437   int _detach(l4_addr_t start, unsigned long size, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00438               L4::Cap<L4::Task> task, unsigned flags) const throw();
00439 };
00440 
00441 
00442 inline int
00443 Rm::detach(l4_addr_t addr, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00444            L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task) const throw()
00445 {  return _detach(addr, 1, mem, task, Detach_overlap); }
00446 
00447 inline int
00448 Rm::detach(void *addr, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00449            L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task) const throw()
00450 {  return _detach((l4_addr_t)addr, 1, mem, task, Detach_overlap); }
00451 
00452 inline int
00453 Rm::detach(l4_addr_t addr, unsigned long size, L4::Cap<Dataspace> *mem,
00454            L4::Cap<L4::Task> const &task) const throw()
00455 {  return _detach(addr, size, mem, task, Detach_exact); }
00456 
00457 };
